solution_line_template: It takes {minutes_per_interval} minutes to burn {coals_burned_per_interval} coals, so the grill ran for {total_coals_burned} / {coals_burned_per_interval} * {minutes_per_interval} = <<{total_coals_burned}/{coals_burned_per_interval}*{minutes_per_interval}={total_minutes_ran}>>{total_minutes_ran} minutes.
